an5.208:1.3: Acakkhussam, mukham duggandham hoti, rasaharaniyo na visujjhanti, pittam semham bhattam pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchadeti.
an5.208:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava dantakatthassa akhadane.
an5.208:2.3: Cakkhussam, mukham na duggandham hoti, rasaharaniyo visujjhanti, pittam semham bhattam na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chadeti.
an5.208:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca anisamsa dantakatthassa khadane”ti.
